00020 require 'simbio_mysql_result.inc.php';
00021 
00033 class simbio_mysql extends simbio
00034 {
00035     private $db_host = '127.0.0.1';
00036     private $db_port = 3306;
00037     private $db_socket = '';
00038     private $db_name = '';
00039     private $db_username = '';
00040     private $db_passwd = '';
00041     private $res_conn = false;
00042     public $affected_rows = 0;
00043     public $insert_id = 0;
00044     public $errno = false;
00045 
00056     public function __construct($str_host, $str_username, $str_passwd, $str_dbname, $int_port = 3306, $str_socket = '')
00057     {
00058         $this->db_host = $str_host;
00059         $this->db_port = $int_port;
00060         $this->db_socket = $str_socket;
00061         $this->db_name = $str_dbname;
00062         $this->db_username = $str_username;
00063         $this->db_passwd = $str_passwd;
00064         // execute connection
00065         $this->connect();
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00074     private function connect()
00075     {
00076         if ($this->db_socket) {
00077             $this->res_conn = @mysql_connect($this->db_host.":".$this->db_socket, $this->db_username, $this->db_passwd);
00078         } else {
00079             $this->res_conn = @mysql_connect($this->db_host.":".$this->db_port, $this->db_username, $this->db_passwd);
00080         }
00081         // check the connection status
00082         if (!$this->res_conn) {
00083             $this->error = 'Error Connecting to Database. Please check your configuration';
00084             parent::showError(true);
00085         } else {
00086             // select the database
00087             $db = @mysql_select_db($this->db_name, $this->res_conn);
00088             if (!$db) {
00089                 $this->error = 'Error Opening Database';
00090                 parent::showError(true);
00091             }
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095 
00102     public function query($str_query = '')
00103     {
00104         if (empty($str_query)) {
00105             $this->error = "Error on simbio_mysql::query() method : query empty";
00106             parent::showError(true);
00107         } else {
00108             // create simbio_mysql_result object
00109             $result = new simbio_mysql_result($str_query, $this->res_conn);
00110             // get any properties from result object
00111             $this->affected_rows = $result->affected_rows;
00112             $this->errno = $result->errno;
00113             $this->error = $result->error;
00114             $this->insert_id = $result->insert_id;
00115             // return the result object
00116             if ($this->error) {
00117                 return false;
00118             } else {
00119                 return $result;
00120             }
00121         }
00122     }
00123 
00124 
00131     public function escape_string($str_data)
00132     {
00133         return mysql_real_escape_string($str_data, $this->res_conn);
00134     }
00135 
00136 
00142     public function close()
00143     {
00144         mysql_close($this->res_conn);
00145     }
00146 }
00147 ?>
